name: CreateIpAccessControlList
description: Associate an IP Access Control List with a Trunk

TrunkSid.description: The SID of the Trunk to associate the IP Access Control List with.

IpAccessControlListSid.description: The SID of the [IP Access Control List](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/sip/api/sip-ipaccesscontrollist-resource) that you want to associate with the trunk.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the IpAccessControlList resource.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [RFC 2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [RFC 2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.
**friendly_name**: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the IpAccessControlList resource.
**trunk_sid**: The SID of the Trunk the resource is associated with.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
